name: PlayStation VR2
description: Experience next-gen virtual reality with the PlayStation VR2 headset, featuring stunning 4K HDR visuals and an immersive gaming experience.

name: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
description: Swing into action as Miles Morales and save New York in this action-packed standalone adventure for PlayStation 5.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
description: Join Ratchet and Clank on an interdimensional adventure with mind-blowing visuals and physics-defying gameplay for PlayStation 5.

name: PlayStation 4 Slim
description: The slimmer and lighter version of the PlayStation 4, delivering excellent gaming and entertainment with a sleek new design.

name: Demon's Souls (PS5)
description: The legendary classic returns, rebuilt from the ground up for PlayStation 5. Experience the unsettling darkness, intense combat, and challenging bosses in Demon's Souls.
